tool_description: Combines multiple individual scoring components (demographic, behavioral, firmographic) into a weighted composite lead score using customizable weighting schemes.

weighting_scheme.description: Weights for demographic, behavioral, firmographic, and custom scores

error_messages: Invalid score values: All scores must be between 0 and 100.
Missing required scores: demographic_score and behavioral_score are required.
Invalid weighting scheme: Weights must sum to 1.0 and match number of provided scores.
Invalid score bounds: score_floor must be less than score_ceiling and within valid ranges.
Too many custom scores: Maximum 5 custom score components allowed.
usage: Provide demographic_score and behavioral_score as minimum input. Include firmographic_score and custom_scores as needed. Configure weighting_scheme to balance score components appropriately.

score_breakdown.description: Individual contribution of each score component

score_grade.description: Letter grade representation of composite score (A, B, C, D, F)

confidence_level.description: Statistical confidence in composite score accuracy (0-100)
